core::ops::ControlFlow: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(0, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 11, kind: RigidTy(Uint(Usize)) })])

doc:
Gets the index of a dynamically-allocated CPU-local object
 within the chunk.

 Returns `None` if the object does not belong to the chunk.
